description:
Battle your thirst, not your reservoir. Made of a more rigid material than traditional reservoirs, this one is easier to fill and to dry.

  • Made of polyethylene film that is BPA and PVC free
  • Soft moulded 3D shape with full length internal baffle prevents contact between the two sides to speed up drying time and discourage bacteria growth
  • DryLock magnetic bite valve lets you lock off the valve for leak-free travel to and from the trail
  • Rubberized fill port opening and crescent shaped handle design keep the reservoir steady in your hands no matter when you fill it up
  • Integrated QuickDry hanger makes it easy to hang the reservoir upside down to dry
name: Gregory 3D Hydro 3L Reservoir
